name: Introductory Physics
description: An introduction to the basics of physics, including mechanics, thermodynamics, and electricity and magnetism.

name: Modern Physics
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of modern physics, including quantum mechanics, special relativity, and particle physics.

name: Classical Optics
description: An introduction to the basics of optics, including ray optics, interference, diffraction, and optical systems.

name: Quantum Optics
description: An introduction to the basics of quantum optics, including emission and absorption of electromagnetic radiation, photon statistics, and entanglement.

name: Advanced Optics
description: An introduction to the more advanced topics of optics, including nonlinear optics, quantum optics, and optical fiber networks.
